name: BOSS SLAYER (Rafox)
description:
Welcome to Boss Slayer!

The Princess was kidnapped by a Monster and taken to a Castle. Your objective is to kill the 5 BOSSES protecting said Castle in order to save the Princess! This is easier said than done...

Play the game to learn more about it! It is recommended to play the game in fullscreen.

- CONTROLS (Mentioned in the Tutorial):

Press WASD to move around - Press Space to shrink

- CREDITS:

There are A LOT of people to credit, so I decided to credit them all in one text file that you can download. If you like the music/images/backgrounds used in my game, I highly recommend checking out the text file! My game would not exist without them!
